comments.text:
+blockhead134 OK, so. lets just start with your original comment. "velkos 
sucks" I main him and do very well (best game in this week was 30ish and 4 
(if you need to check you can) so that means, velkos doesnt suck. he may be 
squishy, but there is many options to overcome that. If you dont like him 
fine, but please dont bash my fav champ.
comments.author: Tank Lord

comments.text:
+Tank Lord If that was true, then buffs and nerfs would NEVER HAPPEN. 
Achieving perfect imbalance is all but impossible. in addition, there would 
not be a meta if all champs are equal. True, most champs can be played 
successfully until higher elo, but tha dosent mean that they are good, 
simply that the player is.
comments.author: blockhead134

comments.text:
+blockhead134 yes, it does. if you were an actual good player (not saying 
you arent) you would know every champ is good and they all can be.
